page.title: 18A Day in Life of a Mother.
page.content:
Whipton Barton Middle School asked a mother to describe a typical day in her life from the moment she woke up to the moment she went to bed. This was the result:
7.00 am Alarm, Crawl out of bed, Family arise, 8.00 am Breakfast, Husband leaves for work, All 3 children struck deaf;chaos as they leave for school, 8.35 am Household chores, 10.30 am Coffee, 10.45 am Prepare evening meal, cooking or washing, 12.30 pm Lunch, 2.00 pm Gardening and cut lawn, 3.00 pm Change, collect children. 4.00 pm children undo housework in 5 mins..!, 5.45 pm Dad arrives home tired.6p.m. Dinnertime, 6.30 pm family help with washing up, 9.00 pm Andrew to bed, 9.00 pm Relax at last!, 10.45 pm Sleep!.
